attributes.action: Create a law protecting the NHS from privatisation under ANY government
attributes.additional_details:
American health care companies are circling - so it’s time to take action.

This proposed law would protect the NHS from privatisation, thereby protecting us all at our most vulnerable. Instead of focusing on money, patients can continue to focus on rehab/ recovery/ getting home.

If we allow corporations to take control we will all suffer. None of us know what health conditions or accidents we could have in the future. 

Please sign. Please share.
attributes.background:
I’m Hannah, I’m 21 and I have a variety of serious degenerate health conditions. The NHS has saved my life (and others) numerous times, and now we need to return the favour. 

Free, world class care at the point of access is a huge gift we must protect. Once it’s gone it isn’t coming back.
